created.title: Donation created
created.description: Your donation has been requested, the system is waiting for payment confirmation.

confirmed.title: Donation confirmed
confirmed.description: Your donation has been confirmed. Thank you for trusting Square Cloud, we do our job focusing on the experience you deserve!
confirmed.bonus: As an added bonus we have added +3 days of plan for you! ðŸ¥°

warn.title: Plan expiring
warn.description: Your plan will expire in {days} day(s), if there is no renewal all your applications will be removed and the other backups will be sent to your DM.
warn.footer: The system will try to send the backups, if it fails, we are not responsible. Always keep backups up to date!

expired.title: Plan expired
expired.description: Your plan has expired, all your applications will be removed and all other backups will be sent to your DM.
expired.footer: The system will try to send the backups, if it fails, we are not responsible. Always keep backups up to date!

fail.title: Backup Failed
fail.footer: Unfortunately, the system was unable to backup your application.

success.title: Backup Performed
success.footer: The download expires in 6 hours and can only be performed once.
